31
32/* These routines are in a separate file so that the mpz_t, mpq_t and mpf_t
33 operator<< routines can avoid dragging vsnprintf into the link (via
34 __gmp_asprintf_format). */
35
36#include <stdarg.h>
37#include <stdio.h>
38#include <stdlib.h>
39#include <string.h>
40
41#include "gmp.h"
42#include "gmp-impl.h"
43
44
45int
46__gmp_asprintf_memory (struct gmp_asprintf_t *d, const char *str, size_t len)
47{
48 GMP_ASPRINTF_T_NEED (d, len);
49 memcpy (d->buf + d->size, str, len);
50 d->size += len;
51 return len;
52}
53
54int
55__gmp_asprintf_reps (struct gmp_asprintf_t *d, int c, int reps)
56{
57 GMP_ASPRINTF_T_NEED (d, reps);
58 memset (d->buf + d->size, c, reps);
59 d->size += reps;
60 return reps;
61}
62
63int
64__gmp_asprintf_final (struct gmp_asprintf_t *d)
65{
66 char *buf = d->buf;
67 ASSERT (d->alloc >= d->size + 1);
68 buf[d->size] = '\0';
69 __GMP_REALLOCATE_FUNC_MAYBE_TYPE (buf, d->alloc, d->size+1, char);
70 *d->result = buf;
71 return 0;
72}
73
